Name: Guards
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (expressed & discarded) and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Old Guard but this Sweet Martini , which benefits from a splash of orange curaçao, deserves a place on modern cocktail lists.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Stanley M. Jones' 1977 Jones' Complete Barguide .
Nutrition: One serving of Guards contains 161 calories
